wikipedia_page.main: Chris Jackson (born 29 October 1973) is a Scottish footballer, who played for Hibernian, Stirling Albion, Cowdenbeath, Clydebank, Montrose, East Fife, Stenhousemuir, Brechin City and Arbroath.
